name: Giant Fun Golf
description:
Instructions:

- Touch & drag your finger, until your satisfied with your aim position.

- Lift your finger to lock the aim position & start the power bar.

- Click on the blue button to hit the ball, at the desired strength.

- If you would like to reset your aim bar, press the red button.

The game has 3 levels, Try to pass them with as little strikes as you can!

Have Fun.
